description: Skeletons lack stomachs to enjoy roller coasters.
title: Skeleton's Ride
n_1: Bones and Skully are at the amusement park.
n_2: Bones hops into the roller coaster cart.
n_3: The roller coaster speeds down a steep drop.
n_4: Bones gets off the roller coaster, holding his ribs.
c1_4: I think I'm gonna be sick...
c2_4: Told you, no stomach for it!
